# APIs

## Issuer

```
  Request:
  - Creates claim json on server with filename <to>_sp_org_membership_claim.json
  POST /generate-claim
  {
    to: <holder_address>
  }

  Response
  {
    "claimSignatureHash": <claim signature hash>,
    "claim": [
      "141225134797981430320623274304606204819",
      "0",
      "1",
      "0",
      "0",
      "0",
      "309433331357495568841175401387500336053",
      "0"
    ],
    "sigR8x": "4717229285080775669274002845237593374478723269102787708174480006715920942741",
    "sigR8y": "3721872711820710240857063732297196675633876238578255555531902182109156439125",
    "sigS": "1577412701992880954508430090435421923106939430220939570270994627057848127489",
  }
```

## Holder
  generates solidity verifier contract calldata for verifier's query

```
Request:
- Retrieves claim generated for holder from server
GET /get-claim/<holder_address>

Response
{
  "claim": [
    "141225134797981430320623274304606204819",
    "0",
    "1",
    "0",
    "0",
    "0",
    "309433331357495568841175401387500336053",
    "0"
  ],
  "sigR8x": "4717229285080775669274002845237593374478723269102787708174480006715920942741",
  "sigR8y": "3721872711820710240857063732297196675633876238578255555531902182109156439125",
  "sigS": "1577412701992880954508430090435421923106939430220939570270994627057848127489",
}
```
